item.title: Jun 1958, Family Directory of James Richards Robinson Family
item.description: Scans of Jun 1958, Family Directory of James Richards Robinson Family from the archives of Jeffrey Smith Jr.

item.title: Family: Compilation of information on the Boardman, Williams, Robinson, Brust families, by Emily Brust Crane, 2008.
item.description: Scans from a photocopy of the book provided by the author and republished here with her permission. The original digital files were not available. The photocopies and accompanying materials have been deposited with Leslie Smith for inclusion in the archives of Jeffrey Smith Jr. in Woodhull NY.
